text: Roger Meddows Taylor (born 26 July 1949) is an English musician, singer and songwriter. He is best known as the drummer of the rock band Queen. Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:English rock drummers Category:English rock singers Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Entertainers from Cornwall Category:People from King's Lynn Category:Queen (band) members
title: Roger Taylor (Queen drummer)
